TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NavigationFailedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供用于 NavigationFailed 事件的数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些事件自变量包含有关一个导航器失败，并将传递给处理程序的信息**NavigationFailed**事件，通过以下实现：These event arguments contain information about a navigation that failed, and are passed to handlers of the **NavigationFailed** event, which is implemented by the following: - - - - 封装导航失败的请求的以下详细信息： encapsulates the following details of the failed navigation request: - **导航启动**: 。**Navigation Initiation**: . - **导航异常**: ， 。**Navigation Exception**: , . - **导航内容**: 。**Navigation Content**: . - **导航详细信息**: ， 。**Navigation Details**: , . - **导航状态**: 。**Navigation State**: .

The that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将为或 will be either a or an

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用于将特定于特定导航的特定于上下文数据传递。 can be used to pass context-specific data that is specific to a particular navigation. 包含对时调用，作为第二个参数传递的对象的引用或。 contains a reference to the object that is passed as the second argument when calling either or . 否则，它是 `null`。Otherwise, it is `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否已处理了失败导航异常。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the failed navigation exception has been handled.

value.span: 如果已处理异常，则为 ；否则为 （默认值）。

span.span: if the exception is handled; otherwise, (default).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理到通过失败的导航窗格中，和你而引发的异常，不需要的进程[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]若要继续处理异常，应设置属性`true`。When you handle to process an exception that is thrown as a result of a failed navigation, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing the exception, you should set the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebRequest As WebRequest
public: property System::Net::WebRequest ^ WebRequest { System::Net::WebRequest ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于请求指定内容的 Web 请求。

span.span: Gets the web request that was used to request the specified content.

value.span: 获取用于请求指定内容的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that was used to request the specified content.

value.span: 如果导航到对象，则 为 。

span.span: If navigating to an object, is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象基类，用于封装 web 请求，并且协议不可知。 is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web request, and is protocol agnostic. 对于每个通用的协议，.NET Framework 包括派生自的类并将其扩展使用特定于协议的状态和行为，包括：For each common protocol, the .NET Framework includes a class that derives from and extends it with protocol-specific state and behavior, including: - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`pack://`方案来请求应用程序数据文件 (请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`http://`方案从 Web 服务器请求文件。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`ftp://`方案请求文件从 FTP 服务器。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`file://`方案请求本地文件。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebResponse As WebResponse
public: property System::Net::WebResponse ^ WebResponse { System::Net::WebResponse ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取尝试下载请求的特定内容之后返回的 Web 响应。

span.span: Gets the web response that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.

value.span: 尝试下载请求的特定内容之后返回的 。

span.span: The that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.

value.span: 如果导航失败，则 为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个封装了 web 响应的抽象基类，协议不可知。 is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web response, and is protocol agnostic. 对于每个通用的协议，.NET Framework 包括派生自的类并将其扩展与特定于协议的状态，包括：For each common protocol, the .NET Framework includes a class that derives from and extends it with protocol-specific state, including: - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`pack://`方案来请求应用程序数据文件 (请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`http://`方案从 Web 服务器请求文件。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`ftp://`方案请求文件从 FTP 服务器。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers. - :[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]使用`file://`方案请求本地文件。: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
